thread.title: Nigella Lawson's lookalike daughter Cosima Diamond flips the bird at papparazzi on night out with her famous mum
thread.title_full: Nigella Lawson's lookalike daughter Cosima Diamond flips the bird at papparazzi on night out with her famous mum

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Nigella Lawson's lookalike daughter Cosima Diamond flips the bird at papparazzi on night out with her famous mum
text:
Nigella Lawson's lookalike daughter Cosima Diamond flips the bird at papparazzi on night out with her famous mum TV chef's daughter is the spitting image of her Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Nigella Lawson treated her daughter Cosima Diamond to a night out at the theatre last night. 
The 57-year-old TV chef and her 23-year-old daughter headed out in London to see The Wipers Times play. 
And fans couldn't believe how much the young woman - full name Cosima Thomasina Diamond – looked like her famous mum. 
With her striking features and long dark hair she looks just like a mini Nigella in the making. Nigella Lawson's daughter Cosima looks just like her famous mum 
Nigella also has a son Bruno, 21, with her first husband John Diamond – who died of cancer in 2001. 
But despite her famous parents, it seems Nigella's eldest is not quite used to attention from paparazzi just yet. 
As she clambered into a taxi with her famous mum, Cosima flipped the bird at the waiting photographers. 
Earlier in the night Nigella posed for photographs alone – without her camera-shy daughter. Nigella looked flawless all in black (Photo: FameFlynet UK Tel : +44 (0)20 3551 5049 Email : info@fameflynet.uk.com) She enjoyed a night at the theatre with her daughter (Photo: FameFlynet UK Tel : +44 (0)20 3551 5049 Email : info@fameflynet.uk.com) 
She wore seductive thigh-high suede boots with a pair of simple leggings. 
The cook covered up in a smart black peacoat. She wore thigh-high boots (Photo: Rex Features) Her daughter was camera-shy (Photo: FameFlynet) 
She wore her signature dark hair in glossy loose waves. 
Showing off her natural beauty, Nigella wore barely-there makeup. Like us on Facebook
